meanings.definition: A program or school for children before they enter kindergarten.
meanings.sent1: Many parents enroll their children in prekindergartens to prepare them for school.
meanings.sent2: The prekindergartens in our area focus on early childhood development.
meanings.sent3: The little ones in prekindergartens are like busy bees buzzing around.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a prekindergarten of ideas, waiting to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The colorful classrooms in prekindergartens make learning fun and engaging.

meanings.definition: The period of time before kindergarten.
meanings.sent1: During the prekindergartens, children learn important social skills.
meanings.sent2: Parents cherish the memories made during the prekindergartens of their kids' lives.
meanings.sent3: The prekindergartens seemed to stretch on forever in the eyes of the eager children.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the prekindergartens of her early years.
meanings.sent5: The innocence of childhood shines brightly in the prekindergartens of each little one.
